SEARCH
Package productClasses

Class Product

java.lang.Object
productClasses.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Book, Hardware, LearningResource, OfficeEquipment, Stationery
public abstract class Product extends Object implements Serializable
Represents the blueprint of any products sold on UniShop. A product can be specialized into a book, hardware, learning resource, office equipment or stationary product. This class contains basic methods, such as updating the overall notes for this product and converting data to string in order to display them properly.
See Also:

      title - String, product's title
      description - String, product's description
      category - Category, product's category
      price - float, product's price
      basePoints - int, product's base points
      seller - Seller, product's seller
      quantity - int, available number of this product
      sellDate - String, product's sell date
